Working with Less and Stylus

Setting up Atomic Docs with Less or Stylus is pretty easy, but comes with one caveat.

Caveat

By convention, LESS and Stylus partials are not prefixed with an underscore like Sass partials are. In Atomic Docs, at least for the moment, all partials are created with the underscore whether Sass, Less or Stylus. If this doesn't make you sad everything should work fine.

Steps

The following are the steps for setting up Atomic Docs to work with Less. For stylus use the styl extension instead less as shown in the example.

  • open up atomic-config.php and change $config['preCssDir'] to equal less. Also change $config['preCssExt'] to equal less (you can name this whatever you want actually).
